alert.note: Alert for Breathitt (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 12:15AM EST until February 18 at 3:00AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... North Fork Kentucky River at Jackson affecting Breathitt County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...North Fork Kentucky River at Jackson. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM EST Friday the stage was 29.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 PM EST Friday was 29.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tonight and continue falling to 4.2 feet Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 29.7 feet on 03/05/2015. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. The next statement will be issued 2 AM EST tonight.
